Module schach
Package schach.model

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • schach.model.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class representing a chess piece

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece​(Square position,
             boolean white,
             Board board)
        Constructor of Piece the square where the piece is placed, marked and gets the Piece Object passed
        Parameters:
        position - denotation of the square where the piece will be initiated on
        white - true if it is a piece of the white set, false if black
        board - the board where the piece will be played on
